item.title: Ethereum Withdrawal Momentum Paused, with CEX Net Inflow of 115.2K ETH in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Coinglass data, during the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of ETH on CEX was 115,200. The top three CEX inflows are as follows:· Binance, with an inflow of 217,800 ETH;· Bybit, with an inflow of 16,100 ETH;· Kraken, with an inflow of 5,466.09 ETH.In addition, Coinbase Pro experienced an outflow of 102,500 ETH and ranked first in outflows.

item.title: Canadian Prime Minister: Had a "Productive" Conversation with Trump
item.description: On August 22nd, Canadian Prime Minister Trudeau stated that he had a "productive" chat with U.S. President Trump.Previously, according to market reports, Canadian Prime Minister Trudeau had a conversation with U.S. President Trump on Thursday. During this conversation, they discussed trade challenges and opportunities. (FXStreet)

item.title: In the past 4 hours, there has been a total of $76.124 million in liquidations across the network, primarily from long positions.
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Coinglass data, within the past 4 hours, the total liquidation across the entire network reached $76.124 million. The long liquidations totaled $65.2609 million, and the short liquidations totaled $10.8631 million.In the past 24 hours, a total of 79,007 people worldwide have been liquidated, with a total liquidation amount of $225 million. The largest single liquidation took place on Bybit - BTCUSDT, amounting to $4.8965 million.

item.title: 「Brother Big T」 Huang Licheng currently holds a long position with a value of $140 million in BTC, ETH, and other tokens, with a current unrealized loss of $9.81 million.
item.description: On August 22nd, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight (accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD), "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng currently holds a long position worth $140 million in BTC, ETH, HYPE, PUMP, and YZY. The current floating loss amounts to $9.81 million.Among them, the ETH long position has a holding value of $99.64 million. The opening price is $4,555.17, the liquidation price is $3,142.20, and the floating loss is $7.80 million.

item.title: BTCS is partnering with EST to launch the Bividend blockchain dividend platform with ETH payment.
item.description: On August 22nd, the US stock Ethereum strategic reserve company BTCS Inc. collaborated with Equity Stock Transfer (EST) to launch the blockchain dividend platform Bividend, which will be paid in ETH.Previously reported, BTCS stated that it will distribute a one-time blockchain dividend to shareholders in the form of Ethereum (ETH), at a rate of $0.05 per share. Furthermore, for shareholders who convert their holdings into book entry form and continue to hold them until January 26, 2026, an additional $0.35 per share Ethereum loyalty reward will be distributed. Eligible shareholders in total can receive a $0.40 per share ETH dividend (including the dividend and loyalty reward).

item.title: LookOnChain: SOL Drops Below $180
item.description: On August 22nd, according to HTX market data, SOL dropped below $180, experiencing a 24-hour decline of 2.55%.

item.title: LookOnChain: Coinbase Lists USD1
item.description: On August 22nd, according to official information, Coinbase is going to provide support for World Liberty Financial USD (USD1) on the Ethereum network. Provided that liquidity conditions are fulfilled, trading will commence later on this day.

item.title: Definitive Launches Cross-Chain Transaction Feature
item.description: On August 22nd, the on-chain transaction execution platform Definitive launched cross-chain transaction functionality. It supports cross-chain gasless transactions and enables the management of multi-chain investment portfolios within one interface. Currently, it already supports chains such as Base, Solana, Avalanche, Hyperliquid, BNB Chain, and more. In addition, DEFINITIVE offers aggregated and optimized transaction routing functionality.

item.title: Republic Launches Wallet and Launchpad Support for Injective
item.description: On August 22nd, as per official information, the investment platform Republic declared an integration with Injective. This led to the launch of the Republic Wallet and a specific Launchpad that supports Injective. The purpose of this integration is to achieve direct interoperability between the Injective Layer 1 blockchain and the Republic tokenized investment ecosystem.

item.title: YZY Money: In the coming days, a new feature will be released for YZY users
item.description: On August 22nd, Kanye West initiated YZY MONEY and sent out a tweet stating, "In the forthcoming days, novel features will be implemented for YZY users. Engaging in innovative projects in the short term while concentrating on long-term sustainable growth."
